FuncDef: The reset traffic-statistics vsi command clears VPLS PW traffic statistics.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display traffic-statistics vsi command allows you to check VPLS PW traffic statistics. To check VPLS PW traffic statistics collected within a specific period of time, you need to clear the previous traffic statistics by running the reset traffic-statistics vsi peer command.
You can specify negotiation-vc-id , remote-site , or ldp129 as required.
Prerequisites
The traffic-statistics enable or traffic-statistics peer command must have been run in the VSI-LDP view, if you want to check LDP VPLS PW traffic statistics.
Configuration Impact
After the reset traffic-statistics vsi peer command is run, all the previous statistics on the specified PW are cleared.
